columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DX_HAC_CAT
columns.description: Indicates the HAC category for the diagnosis when all HAC criteria are met.

columns.name: DX_HAC_CAT_1
columns.description: The first HAC category for the diagnosis line.

columns.name: DX_HAC_CAT_2
columns.description: The second HAC category for the diagnosis line.

columns.name: DX_HAC_CAT_3
columns.description: The third HAC category for the diagnosis line.

columns.name: DX_HAC_CAT_4
columns.description: The fourth HAC category for the diagnosis line.

columns.name: DX_HAC_CAT_5
columns.description: The fifth HAC category for the diagnosis line.
